amendment.description: To require a report on the biometrics programs of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4398 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4398 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6387) To require a report on the biometrics programs of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4398 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4398 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
